title: Affection and Aversion

en: Hey, #NAME! I know you're busy with your work, but can you help me make sense of some of my family craziness?

yes_caption: Sure, Skylar, I'm here for you.
no_caption: Again? I'm sorry. I just don't have time for this stuff now.

en: I really appreciate you listening. I know it's hard for you to focus on other things right now.
Oh, so your work has priority over my needs? Fine.
